author: Rebecca Shabad
title: Michigan Gov. Whitmer says she hopes to have 'some relaxing' of stay-at-home order by May 1
description: Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said Friday that she hopes to be in a position to ease her state’s strict stay-at-home order by May 1, though she warned that it must be a decision based on scientific data in order to prevent a second wave of the coronavirus.
content: WASHINGTON Michigan Gov. Gretchen Whitmer said Friday that she hopes to be in a position to ease her states strict stay-at-home order by May 1, although she warned that it must be a decision based on scientific data to prevent a second wave of the coronavirus… [+2136 chars]
